title: Rocket League sales revenue worldwide 2016
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month June 2016 and lowest at Month December 2015.
The highest value at Month June 2016 is 1.57x times more than the lowest value at December 2015.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 2 number of Months.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month June 2016 and lowest at Month December 2015.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month June 2016 and lowest at Month December 2015.
The highest value at Month June 2016 is 1.57x times more than the lowest value at December 2015.
max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
Month June 2016 has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and December 2015 has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The lowest value at Month December 2015 is 1.57x times less than the highest value at June 2016.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars has declined over the past 2 Months.
The Month December 2015 tends to be 1.22 percent lower than average.
